column4: the install of Compress::Zlib says i need ICompress::raw:zlib ... but it doesn't say anything abou the site i read that i should install the first, that i should get the raw:Zlib one ... i should still get it, right?
is that Compress::Zlib the perl module?
I think you could do it like this -- sudo perl -mCPAN -e 'install "Compress:;Zlib"'
